comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Mr. Basil Grant was well known as the General Manager of Nicholson's, Ltd. he was also an associate of band leader Eric Sheldon who often features elsewhere in the Thomas Lennon Photographic Collection. In an account of the Music Week Ball held on 29 August 1934 he is mentioned as playing in a small musical grouping with Sheldon. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17090341 In 1936 Basil Grant was noted as being the General Manager of Nicholson's, Ltd. a music supply company. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17287530 In additional to working at Nicholson's he was also an assayer. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article75947906
